title: Greg Cox (American football)
text: Gregory Mark Cox (born January 6, 1965) is a former professional <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="Safety%20%28American%20football%20position%29">safety</a> in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a>. He played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> for the <a href="San%20Jose%20State%20Spartans%20football">San Jose State Spartans</a>. He played four seasons for the <a href="San%20Francisco%2049ers">San Francisco 49ers</a> (1988, 1990–1991) and the <a href="New%20York%20Giants">New York Giants</a> (1989).
